meaningMnemonic: Next to the <radical>scooter</radical>, there's a <radical>flag</radical> warning you that there are <radical>sheep</radical> around here, so you should go <kanji>slow</kanji>. That means you might be <kanji>late</kanji>, but at least the sheep will be okay!
readingMnemonic: You follow the flag, but the sheep refuse to <kanji>slow</kanji> down so you have to get creative. You place <reading>chee</reading>se (ち) every ten feet or so, that way the sheep slow down to bend down on their scooters and take a bite.
